name: NIF Path Tool
short_description:
The NIF path tool is a utility to fix the path names to textures in NIF files.  NIF files are used for meshes in many popular games such as Skyrim, Oblivion, and Morrowind.  This utility is intended to help mod'ers make new items for these games.

The utility is currently in beta status and is under development.  The command line tool is mostly functional and a GUI will be deployed soon.

The utility uses the excellent PyFFI library and is developed as a python 2.7 application.
summary: Utility to fix texture paths in NIF files
